Plot: Shortly after a tornado rips through her Kansas home, Dorothy returns to Oz to save her friends from a villainous jester.
Title: Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return
Writer: Roger S. Baum (novel), Randi Barnes (screenplay), Adam Balsam (screenplay), Daniel St. Pierre (contributing writer)
Actors: Dan Aykroyd, James Belushi, Kelsey Grammer, Lea Michele
tomatoConsensus: Faced with the choice between staying in or seeing Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return, most filmgoers will be forced to conclude that there's no place like home.
